ygData.subject: RE: Bind Wound
ygData.msgSnippet: My Mage friend claimed his was at like 125 at the time (since I don t have a mage I honestly can t say).. ... From: Princess Xaera [mailto:xaera@hotmail.com]
ygData.messageBody:
My Mage friend claimed his was at like 125 at the time (since I don't have a
mage I honestly can't say)..



-----Original Message-----
From: Princess Xaera [mailto:xaera@...]
Sent: Friday, October 08, 1999 10:51 AM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [shadowknight] Bind Wound


From: "Princess Xaera" <xaera@...>

I'm under the impression that everyone other then monks was capped at 100.
My wizard is capped at 100 and so is my SK. Only person that I met with a
higher bandage skill was a Monk..............


>From: "Wilson, ThomasX B" <thomasx.b.wilson@...>
>
>Ok something has been bugging me lately. Why is our Bind Wound capped at
>100? I didn't even thing about this till yesterday when a Monk friend of
>mine happen to use the skill on me. Healed me for over twice what I could
>have done. So I started asking around, hell a mage I group with has a
>higher
>bind skill then I do. Does anybody know what the other hybrids cap at? I
>would have thought that since the other hybrids get some type of heal they
>would cap lower and we would cap higher (200 would be nice).
>
>Anyway just a thought..
>
